metadata.title: Songs of the Chicano Movement
description: Included here are songs of struggle, hope and vision fuled by the Chicano Movement's quest for civil rights, economic justice and cultural respect. Featuring tracks by: Daniel Valdez, Los Lobos, Agustin Lira and Teatro Campesino, Los Alacranes Mojados, Conjunto Aztlan and many more!
